Text:
You may want to download only the mkv movie(Eng audio + all subs), it is 5.29 GB, then skip all other files from download.	
   ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
A nevemre kattintva fogsz több magyar & szinkronizált filmeket találni.
Használj media player classic-ot hogy automatikusan felismerje és lejátssza a külön levö AC3 szinkron fájlokat.
Bátran kérdezz ha nem tudsz valamit. 
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Those with Win 7 64 bit seem to have issues with playing back seccondary or external audio tracks & subs etc.
Much better then k-lite pack(too complicated) is CCCP ( http://www.cccp-project.net/ )
using the same player MPC) When installing leave all as it is (default). When finished open the player, click View/Options/PlaybackOutput/check Evr Costum Pres & chose System Default under DirectShow Audio.Under Internal Filters - Source Filters should be checked DirectShow Media, Matroska & MP4 and Transform Filters should have H264/AVC(DXVA) checked & next (FFmpeg) unchecked. Now I can even play Blue-ray m2ts being able to switch between Audio tracks by clicking on the Haali Media Spliter on the task bar bottom right.
Nice movie :D I want to watch n__n
